text: PROPAGATION SCHEME Approach #1: Synchronous Q — The master sends updates to replicas and then waits for them to acknowledge that they fully applied (i.e., logged) the [î] [j changes. Approach #2: Asynchronous — The master immediately returns the Q — acknowledgement to the client without .' .' waiting for replicas to apply the changes. 1 P @ S2CMU-DB ,‘; M4 > PI À s00112 @ =T 23 - Distributed OLTP Databases (CMU Databases Systems / Fall 2019)
